values: You Will Be Eaten by Cannibals! Lessons from the Life of John G. PatonYou Will Be Eaten by Cannibals! Lessons from the Life of John G. Paton

Paton’s life was marked by a kind of in-your-face spiritual moxie, and God used his courageous faith to change the world for Christ.Paton’s life was marked by a kind of in-your-face spiritual moxie, and God used his courageous faith to change the world for Christ.
